item.title: Trump Administration To Ease Safety Mandates For Automated Vehicles As Tesla, Waymo Seek to Expand Robotaxi Operations
item.description: The NHTSA stated that current vehicle safety standards, written decades ago, fail to account for automated vehicles.

item.title: Ray Dalio Warns Fed Rate Cut In September Could Trigger Stagflation Risk
item.description: The billionaire investor predicts a weaker dollar, a steeper yield curve, and stocks doing relatively poorly despite the easing.

item.title: Campbell’s Gains Wall Street Confidence With Multiple Price Target Hikes, Retail Chatter Surges
item.description: Bernstein raised its price target on Campbell's to $39 from $38 and noted that the company appears to be taking the right steps to revitalize the port...

item.title: Paramount Tells Staff To Return To Office 5 Days A Week Or Take Severance: Report
item.description: Staff have until September 15 to decide whether to comply with the new mandate, which will kick in starting January next year.

item.title: Summit Therapeutics Gets A $40 Price Target From Guggenheim: Analyst Says It Likes The Stock At $24, Just Like It Did At $3
item.description: The price target of $40 represents an upside of 70% from the stock’s closing price on Wednesday.
